p: Aerial parts of wild S. africana were collected in May in three locations ( Figure 1) (six samples per location). Yields of EO isolated by hydrodistillation, calculated w/ w vs. dry material varied drastically from sample to sample ranging from 0.03 to 0.17% even within a location ( Table S1). As it could be seen from Table S1, the highest yields were obtained from Hamla (0.08–0.14%, samples H1–6) and Bouilef (0.15%, sample B5 and 0.17%, sample B6) and the lower from Bouilef and Fesdis (0.03% for samples B2, B4 and F6).
